segments.text: Excuse me . What should be included in my CV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , a CV or resume is made up of 6 parts , personal information , educational experience , practical experience , personal skills , self-evaluation and job intentions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Including your name , sex , date of birth , height , phone number , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2
